name: wg-studio-devkit
description: Studio development kit with lazy-context pattern, multi-agent orchestration, and AI model integration (Claude + Gemini). Includes product planning, frontend design, and workflow automation.

commands.name: plan
commands.description: Generate product requirements and execution plan with agent approval

commands.name: execute
commands.description: Execute the plan in todo.md using parallel subagents with coordination

commands.name: product-interview
commands.description: Conduct a product interview to refine the MVP concept

commands.name: skip-permissions
commands.description: Skip permission requirements for rapid development

agents.name: product-manager
agents.description: Creates comprehensive product requirements documents with ultra-thinking

agents.name: project-manager
agents.description: Handles task delegation and assignments across software developer agents

agents.name: architect
agents.description: System architecture and technical design decisions

agents.name: product-interviewer
agents.description: Conducts product interviews to refine MVP concepts

skills.name: gemini
skills.description: Send prompts and tasks to Google Gemini using your API key for extended thinking and multimodal analysis

skills.name: frontend-design
skills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality

skills.name: frontend-imitate
skills.description: Imitate and adapt frontend designs from references
